name: perl5-porters
comments: P5P has its own FAQ at http://dev.perl.org/perl5/docs/p5p-faq.html or send email to perl5-porters-faq@perl.org to receive a copy via email
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: perl5-porters-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: A list for people interested in Perl5 core development. High volume and temperature rating.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: perl5-porters-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: perl5-porters-help@perl.org
